settings.title: Payments & Online Safety
settings.text:
Worried about your payment details, or concerns over purchasing online?
Rest assured your payment information is completely safe!

settings.title: Is my payment information safe with you?
settings.text:
Yes, our website is powered and secured by Shopify and is fully PCI compliant by default (Payment Card Industry), so you can be assured your payment information is completely safe.

We personally do not store, nor have access to your payment information.

All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like - Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.

settings.title: Do you accept online payments?
settings.text:
Yes, we accept online payments from the following: -

American Express, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Shop Pay, Mastercard, Maestro, PayPal, Visa, Klarna.. and many more!

All payment processing is powered by Shopify and vital customer information is quick, easy, and secure.

You can learn more about our store's safe checkout experience here.

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.text:
We accept online payments from the following: -

American Express, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Shop Pay, Mastercard, Maestro, PayPal, Visa, Klarna.. and many more!

settings.title: I want to learn more about the payment process on your store
settings.text: For more insight, you can read Shopifyâ€™s Terms of Service here, or their Privacy Statement here.

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
settings.text:
Are you waiting for your order, or would just like to know how long delivery will take?
We hope these faqs will help answer your question.

settings.title: How long will it take to recieve my order?
settings.text:
UK domestic shipping can take up to 5 business days.

For UK Express next day delivery, if ordered before 12pm GMT, you should receive your order the next day.

International shipping could take up to 14 business days, or longer, depending on any delivery issues or delays within your country. Also due to global supply chain challenges, shipping times could be longer than usual.

Please be assured, we will always do everything we can to get your order delivered to you within a reasonable time.

settings.title: How much does delivery cost?
settings.text:
Shipping rates can vary depending on your region and are calculated at checkout.

Here are the full details of our Shipping Policy.

settings.title: Is there free shipping?
settings.text:
Yes, we offer free shipping for large domestic orders.

Check the cart to see the current deal on free shipping.

settings.title: My order was damaged during delivery, what can I do?
settings.text:
If your order has been damaged during delivery, then please contact us within 24 hours of recieving your order to initiate the shipping insurance claim.

Failure to do so may affect your shipping insurance claim and may result in no compensation being provided.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text:
Yes, we ship our products all over the World!

Please note that free shipping may not be applicable for certain International orders, and shipping rates will vary depending on your region.

settings.title: Do you ship to my area?
settings.text:
A full list of all of our shipping areas can be found here.

If your country or region is not listed, please feel free to reach out to see if we can work out the details.

settings.title: Product Warranty
settings.text:
Would you like to know if your product is covered from faults or defects?
We hope these faqs will help answer your question.

settings.title: Do you offer a warranty for your products?
settings.text:
Yes we do!

All our products are subject to strict quality control, and our warranty provides you with a guarantee against manufacturer defects and faults.

We have product information, specifying how long your warranty is here.

settings.title: I've noticed a fault with my product, what can I do?
settings.text:
Our warranty covers any manufacturing, fault, or material defect. Please notify us within 30 days of noticing any defects and we can arrange a refund or replacement for you.

The warranty does not cover any accidental drops, blows, improper use, or other issues that are not attributable to a manufacturer defect.

settings.title: Do you offer an extended warranty?
settings.text:
An extended warranty can be added to your products for an additional cost.

Please get in touch for more information about extended warranties.

settings.title: How much does an extended warranty cost?
settings.text:
The extended warranty could come at a different cost depending on the type of product and extended period.

Please get in touch for more information.

settings.title: Returns & Refunds
settings.text:
Not happy with your Lumi product, or was it damaged during delivery?
We hope these faqs will help answer your question.

settings.title: Do you offer price matching?
settings.text:
Yes we do!

If you see a similar looking portable ice bath anywhere online of a 'real' company, then we will happily match the price.

Simply ask our Live Chat agents today, sending them a link to the similar ice bath you have seen, and they will do the rest!

settings.title: Do you offer Returns & Refunds?
settings.text:
Yes, we offer full and partial refunds.

Please read our Returns & Refund Policy or contact us for more information.

settings.title: How long after purchase can I ask for a refund?
settings.text: A refund request must be submitted within 30 days after the purchase is made.

settings.title: How much can I get refunded?
settings.text:
In the case when the product and packaging are unopened, unused and undamaged, or a manufacturer defect or fault has been found, then you are eligible for a refund or replacement - please contact us with 24 hours of recieving your order to initiate this.

In the case when the packaging has been opened and the product has been used, you are eligible for a partial refund.

In the case when a product has been used, damaged, and the damage is not covered by your warranty, you are not eligible for a refund.

Please check our Terms of Service to see if you're eligible for a refund or contact us for more information.

settings.title: My order was damaged during delivery, what can I do?
settings.text:
If your order has been damaged during delivery, then please contact us within 24 hours of recieving your order to initiate the shipping insurance claim.

Failure to do so may affect your shipping insurance claim and may result in no compensation being provided.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order doesn't have free shipping?
settings.text: When an order does not include free shipping, all shipping costs (including the return shipping) are handled by the customer.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order has free shipping?
settings.text: When an order includes free shipping, only the cost of the return shipping is handled by the customer.
